title: NorthStrive® Companies Inc. Advises and Leads the Successful Closing of Two Strategic California Manufacturing Acquisitions
content:
NorthStrive® Companies is a Newport Beach, California–based management, advisory, and investment firm specializing in U.S.-based opportunities across financial services, manufacturing, and healthcare. We partner with diverse companies and asset classes, deploying our management expertise and capital to drive growth, enhance value, and create sustainable, long-term success.

NEWPORT BEACH, Calif., Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- NorthStrive Companies Inc. is proud to announce its role as advisor and manager on two recent California based manufacturing acquisitions acquired by PMGC Holdings, Inc.

summary: NorthStrive Companies, a California-based management, advisory, and investment firm, has announced its role as an advisor and manager on two recent California based manufacturing acquisitions. The firm is focused on U.S. opportunities across financial services, manufacturing, and healthcare. It is not responsible for any errors, omissions, or delays in this content, nor for any actions taken in reliance on this information. The content may include materials prepared and provided by third parties and is not endorsed by Morningstar.
shortSummary: NorthStrive Companies advises on two strategic California manufacturing acquisitions, one of which is due to be discussed with potential UK-based involvement.
argos_summary: NorthStrive Companies Inc., a Newport Beach-based management and investment firm, announced it will act as advisor and manager for two recent California manufacturing acquisitions by PMGC Holdings, Inc. The firm specializes in financial services, manufacturing, and healthcare, aiming to drive growth and create long‑term value. The release includes standard Morningstar disclaimer that the content is third‑party and not endorsed by Morningstar.
